name: Hungry Bunny
description:
Hungry rabbit will give you the opportunity to transform into a very hungry and dexterous rabbit who loves two things very much - carrots and jumping! Jump across platforms and collect carrots to open a portal to the next level. Avoid dangerous enemies and deep chasms that will stand in your way to satisfy your mad hunger. Can you go through all the portals and get to the very end?

Features:
- Unusual gameplay
- Nice graphics
- Achievements
- Nice soundtrack
